Posted By: DaaNz (3/14/2009 3:30:45 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
sorcery-speed bounce entirely defeats the purpose of bounce.   
  
Bounce is supposed to be cheap and instant-speed so you can punish opponents that try to cheat [demon of death's gate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=demon of death's gate) (or similar cards) into play via its alternate cost the instant after that spell resolves. If you're unable to outright counter it, you need to have the option of delaying it for a while so you can drop that third island.  
  
And four mana? Come on. [Evacuation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evacuation) only costs one more and is a win condition.  
  
This is unplayable as is. Merely making it an instant would have dramatically increased this cards' viability.
posts.html:
sorcery-speed bounce entirely defeats the purpose of bounce.

Bounce is supposed to be cheap and instant-speed so you can punish opponents that try to cheat demon of death's gate (or similar cards) into play via its alternate cost the instant after that spell resolves. If you're unable to outright counter it, you need to have the option of delaying it for a while so you can drop that third island.

And four mana? Come on. Evacuation only costs one more and is a win condition.

This is unplayable as is. Merely making it an instant would have dramatically increased this cards' viability.

Posted By: Aradimar (7/6/2010 3:56:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I actually run copies of this in the sideboard for a Legacy deck. It's a combo that uses [Shuko](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shuko) and [Cephalid Illusionist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cephalid Illusionist) to put my entire deck in my graveyard, and then win with [Dread Return](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dread Return) on [Necrotic Ooze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrotic Ooze). [Morselhoarder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Morselhoarder) and [Cinderhaze Wretch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cinderhaze Wretch) provide infinite mana, and [Spikeshot Elder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spikeshot Elder) lets my Ooze deal infinite damage! I was looking for ways to handle [Leyline of Sanctity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of Sanctity) and settled on this card.  
  
Suggestions for better ideas are welcome.
posts.html:
I actually run copies of this in the sideboard for a Legacy deck. It's a combo that uses Shuko and Cephalid Illusionist to put my entire deck in my graveyard, and then win with Dread Return on Necrotic Ooze. Morselhoarder and Cinderhaze Wretch provide infinite mana, and Spikeshot Elder lets my Ooze deal infinite damage! I was looking for ways to handle Leyline of Sanctity and settled on this card.

Suggestions for better ideas are welcome.
